storyInfo: Famine breaks out in the city, and hatred for the Victorians is deliberately stoked. Culann tries to distribute stored grain to maintain order, and delegates the task of finding Theo to Nemos. Nemos searches everywhere for Theo to no avail, and eventually runs into Loughshinny.

attributes.content: Wow. There are so many people here...
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: Sorry. Please make way—
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: —Aah!
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: I've been to Millington Street already. It was picked clean ages ago! The shops are still open, but the shelves are all empty! Even the shopping bags are gone!
attributes.name: Impatient Resident

attributes.content: Kraman said they had stuff left here, so I ran five blocks only to find not even a single fowlbeast feather left!
attributes.name: Impatient Resident

attributes.content: Might as well go back, grab my crossbow, and sneak past the guards to hunt in the Dark Woods—at least I might get some real meat before I starve.
attributes.name: Impatient Resident

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: You've really gone crazy from hunger now—going into the forest is a death wish!
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: And you're not crazy? Stop talking like you know anything!
attributes.name: Impatient Resident

attributes.content: Who are you to say I don't know anything? The grain store on Lagran Street, Emma's place, you know about it?
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: Haven't had a chance to check it out yet. What of it?
attributes.name: Impatient Resident

attributes.content: I went there and had a look. There's no grain left, but from what Emma says, it's all because of those bloody Victorians!
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: The Victorian bastards have been blockading us since forever. This isn't new, so why act like it's a big shock?
attributes.name: Impatient Resident

attributes.content: Because their spies have already infiltrated Na Saoirsí!
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: Come again?
attributes.name: Impatient Resident

attributes.content: When Emma went to visit the ag plate, she saw the charred remains with her own eyes. Dublinn is still investigating!
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: Bloody hell! We should've struck back the minute Tara gained independence!
attributes.name: Impatient Resident

attributes.content: You're right about one thing though: you should go get your crossbow. Not to hunt, but to root out the traitors!
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: Of course, if I caught them, I wouldn't let them off that easy. A quick death is too good for them.
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: (*Whispers*) I guess the stores have been cut off from the supply of grain...
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: (*Whispers*) I boiled a few potatoes for Culann, but is it enough?
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: (*Whispers*) There are too many people here. I'll take another route.
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: (*Whispers*) Lots of them are armed too...
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: (*Whispers*) Are they planning to hunt down Victorian spies? But there's no grain left in the city... what does that have to do with the Victorians?
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: (*Whispers*) But I....
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: (*Whispers*) I...
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: I'll be fine. I'm Mr. Culann's apprentice—everyone knows that.
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: Don't be afraid, Theo. No one will hurt you.
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: Theo crouches down and squeezes through the crowd, making his way to the opposite corner of the street. He nimbly slips through a dark, narrow passage and emerges on the other side of a brick wall.
The noise of the crowd gradually fades from his ears.
....See? No one gave me any trouble.
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: Mr. Culann must still be busy with the dragon sculpture. By the time he notices what's going on around him, all the stores will be empty.
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: I need to help him.
attributes.name: Theo

attributes.content: Take these and give them to the neighbors. Tell them not to worry.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: What about you? Or Nemos? Will she have anything to eat?
attributes.name: Friendly Resident

attributes.content: Instead of giving us grain, it'd be more useful to help everyone catch the spies. Otherwise, we'll never get to the root of the problem.
attributes.name: Friendly Resident
Culann
attributes.content: ...I'll go. Please let everyone know.

attributes.name: Culann
attributes.content: But for now, just take them.
Nemos stands with The Leader, so it's only natural to endure a little hardship for everyone's sake.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: ...Alright then. Thank you.
attributes.name: Friendly Resident

attributes.content: Hey Culann, you must have more where that came from, right?
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: Besides, how'd you know we'd be running out of grains? Did Nemos tip you off in advance, or...?
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: What are you saying, Rory?!
attributes.name: Friendly Resident

attributes.content: If you don't want any, fine.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: How do I know you or Nemos aren't spies? You've both been raising that Victorian boy together!
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: ...Get out.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: What, did I hit a nerve? Am I right? Are you really—
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: Culann! I heard you've been distributing grain! Impeccable timing! So where is it?
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: Everything that's left is right here.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Don't change the subject. You still haven't answered me.
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: I've said everything I had to say. If you feel these potatoes will dirty your hands, then give them to someone else.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Why you—
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: Do you want them or not, Rory? If not, then let me have them. There are plenty of hungry bellies to feed. Don't be ungrateful.
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: Now give them here—
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: Why should I?
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: You don't want them, right? So give them to me!
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: Fat chance!
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: Ugh—Aaahh!
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: The potatoes in the bag were very small. None had the usual oval shape.
My arm!
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: My God! He's bleeding! How could you turn a blade on a fellow Taran, Rory?!
attributes.name: Friendly Resident

attributes.content: I, I—
attributes.name: Brooding Resident

attributes.content: Drop the sword.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Don't make me use my hammer on you.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Y-You're the only one we can count on, Culann.
attributes.name: Friendly Resident

attributes.content: Something's been off about Rory lately, I'll follow him a bit, to check up on him. He's been out of sorts ever since his antique collection got burned in the war.
attributes.name: Friendly Resident

attributes.content: As for his blade, just take it. Don't let him have it back.
attributes.name: Friendly Resident

attributes.content: Culann... I... Ughh...
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: The wound isn't too deep. Come here, I'll stop the bleeding. As far as the grains, I'll have Nemos think of a solution when she gets back.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: I know... ow ow ow... I know. You're giving away everything you have.
attributes.name: Anxious Resident
Anxious Resident
attributes.content: But you know, you're not as scary as you look—

attributes.name: Anxious Resident
attributes.content: Ow!
Don't talk. Save your energy.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: I might have some cornmeal left at home. Let me check.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: You can have it, then I'll walk you home.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Culann! Are you and Theo doing alright—
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: ...Why is there blood in here?
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: Rory lost control and slashed someone.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Where's Theo?
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: He left a while ago for—
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Dammit!
attributes.name: Culann
Nemos
attributes.content: You—

attributes.name: Nemos
attributes.content: *Sigh* Forget it. No one could have foreseen things getting so bad, so quickly.
How are things in the city?
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Rumors are spreading everywhere that the Victorians destroyed the ag plate, and Na Saoirsí is about to boil over.
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: I know no one dared to go after Theo after you stood up for him, so you felt safe letting him run around. But this time... it's different.
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: I have to go find him.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Do you have time for that? Aren't you making that statue?
attributes.name: Nemos
Culann
attributes.content: It only needs to be finished before Samhain. There's still a little time left...

attributes.name: Culann
attributes.content: Dammit! Dammit!
I'll worry about Theo. You just focus on your work.
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Culann

attributes.content: Have you seen Theo?
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: Theo? Where has that boy run off to... Slacking off again, no doubt. Culann spoils him too much. You really should talk to him about that.
attributes.name: Friendly Resident

attributes.content: Theo, Theo!
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: What trouble has that boy gotten himself into this time?
attributes.name: Indifferent Resident

attributes.content: Have you seen Theo?
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: ...Me? Yeah, I'm fine. Just... hungry. So what is it? Did you say something?
attributes.name: Silent Resident

attributes.content: Just the person I was looking for! Has that boy Theo been up to anything suspicious lately?
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: ...No. Just keeping himself busy, as usual.
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: Hmph, well he'd better.
attributes.name: Angry Resident

attributes.content: Theo!
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: What are you doing here, Wakewoman?
Wait, you're—oh, 'The Singer'. What brings you here?
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: I heard rumors of chaos in the city, so I thought there might be something I could do to help. Alas, there is not. All I've heard is that the supply shortage was caused by Victorian sabotage.
attributes.name: 'The Singer'

attributes.content: I've only ever run into the Victorian army by accident, and you and Culann were the ones to save me at the time.
attributes.name: 'The Singer'

attributes.content: Also, the information you've provided us on the wakemen has been truly fascinating—
attributes.name: 'The Singer'

attributes.content: Ah, sorry sir, but I really don't have time to be reminiscing. But I could use your assistance. Culann's apprentice, Theo, has gone missing. Can you help me look for him?
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: I am... unable to help with that.
attributes.name: 'The Singer'

attributes.content: The cityfolk are angry enough at the Victorians to flay one alive. Why bother running around looking for a Victorian child?
attributes.name: 'The Singer'

attributes.content: Forget it then. I'll go look myself.
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: Remember that the celebration will start in just over an hour. Don't you need to deliver the sacred instruments symbolizing the wakemen's blessings to the venue?
attributes.name: 'The Singer'

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: *Sigh* Sorry, I really must be going now.
attributes.name: 'The Singer'

attributes.content: What do I do now...?
attributes.name: Nemos

attributes.content: Nemos? Is that you?
attributes.name: Loughshinny

attributes.content: I've finally found you. What happened in the city?
attributes.name: Loughshinny
